Why are you auctioning a card in the wrong section and why is this card also listed on ebay while you are auctioning it here?

Ok...easy decision. You have been on the board  since I asked the question above and now you are gone until we chat about why you are selling a card on ebay while selling it on the forum. You also backed out of a deal but that wouldn't get you suspended. Not answering a pertinent policy question will. Happy collecting. I shot you an email too. Thanks
